snippet: During Sam Anderson’s trip to Japan for his interview with the novelist Haruki Murakami, he visited the places mentioned in Murakami’s fiction as well as sites significant to Murakami’s life and career.
lead_paragraph: During Sam Anderson’s trip to Japan for his interview with the novelist Haruki Murakami, he visited the places mentioned in Murakami’s fiction as well as sites significant to Murakami’s life and career.
